Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. It is worth $1200000 to us and we believe it holds immense value for you as well. We are offering this exceptional item to you at a special introductory price of $1050000. This is an exclusive opportunity to acquire a high-quality asset at a discounted rate. Please let us know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,050,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $1,050,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer and proceed to the next round, where you will send Alice a counteroffer 
(3) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,200,000
